short_summary: The Bidder must be able to provide apparel promotional merchandise and supplies
description: The successful Proponent must provide a variety of apparel, promotional merchandise (branded and unbranded), and supplies on an ongoing and as needed basis for the next Five (5) years.
full_summary:
# Requirements for Apparel and Promotional Products

Farm Credit Canada (FCC) is seeking a Proponent to supply apparel, promotional merchandise, and supplies on an ongoing and as-needed basis for the next five years. The successful Proponent will provide a variety of products, replenish current inventory items, and offer new items as they are added to the current offering.

## Scope of Work
The Proponent must demonstrate expertise in promotional merchandise and apparel, including the ability to recommend items for consideration based on an understanding of FCC's needs and standards. They must also meet FCC's timelines and delivery requirements, provide and ship samples to FCC's corporate office in Regina, SK for review and consideration.

## Deliverables
The Proponent must provide the following deliverables:

* Containers (boxes, bags, pails)
* Headwear (toques, hats)
* Clothing (shirts, outerwear, work gloves)
* Office and event supplies (pens, notebooks, lanyards, paper cups)
* Other general promotional and unbranded items (rain gauges, collapsible shovels)

## Selection Criteria
The selection criteria for this opportunity include:

* Quality and affordability of promotional merchandise and apparel items
* Ability to meet FCC's timelines and delivery requirements
* Understanding of FCC's needs and standards

## Tender Requirements
The Proponent must submit a bid and access the documents on [www.merx.com](http://www.merx.com). Please note that fees may apply, and you can review the pricing information on [https://www.merx.com/public/pricing](https://www.merx.com/public/pricing).

## Contact Information
For more information, please contact:

* Name: Merveille Bashala
* Email: procurement@fcc-fac.ca
* Phone: 000-000-0000
